caption: At this moment, Jack's phone rang and his boss gave him a new task. He told Charlie that he needed to go to work. Charlie was very disappointed and had a argue with him. Finally, Jack left. Charlie felt bored, so he called some friends came to Jack's house together. When they were visiting the house, they accidentally hit a metal ball. Suddenly, a door appeared behind the bookcase. It needed a password to open the door, and they eventually discovered that the password was Charlie's birthday. In the door, there was an elevator. They took the elevator to the underground and found a secret headquarters here.
